channel.title: The Chaos Saints! A new Survival RP server!
channel.description:
TCS is the place to be! We sport a friendly staff that loves to hangout and joke around, but are always on hand if you need them.
Come check out our PVP events and feel free to use our brand new Arena!
We've got everything you could possibly want, and if we don't have it, tell us what you want!
This is YOUR server!
http://thechaossaints.wix.com/home
Visit our site to explore all the things you need to know, and come join our community today!
